name: Space-Rocket
description:
🚀  🚀  🚀

A fun and epic Space themed Flying along game. 

Use Space key, or hold left mouse key to fly.

Im new to game making and this was my first game so pleas dont be mean in the comments. 

I hope you have fun playing it and if yes please let me know in the comments also if you have any ideas what to add to the game let me know.

(Somewhere in the game is a hidden game event with a bossfight, where it is and how you get it is your job to find out. Good Luck)

(NOTE: This game is not made for mobile devices because the animations make it lag way to hard!)

🚀  🚀  🚀
